snippet: The History Channel may remake the ABC mini-series that made history when it was broadcast in 1977.
abstract: History Channel buys rights to 1977 mini-series Roots and considers producing remake.
lead_paragraph: The History Channel may remake the ABC mini-series that made history when it was broadcast in 1977.

headline.print_headline: History Channel Is Eying Remake of ‘Roots’
headline.main: History Channel Is Eying Remake of ‘Roots’
